thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com
thread.title: Mike Chapman
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Mike Chapman

author: Mike Chapman
title: Mike Chapman
text:
We have made Burgers hams (City & Country) a part of our family traditions. Whether Easter, Christmas or somewhere in between we always get our hams from them. It took many decades of going through their competitors until finally resolving that Burgers is simply the best! They also have great pies, side dishes, bacon, and summer sausage. Everything at reasonable prices.
Don't look any farther than Burgers, their hams are phenomenal, I assure you that you will have no regrets!
